DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study assess safety effectiveness CYPHER SELECT™ Sirolimus-eluting Coronary Stent reduce angiographic in-stent late loss de novo native coronary lesion compare CYPHER ™ Sirolimus-eluting Coronary Stent .
DOC.brief_title: The Study Compare Cypher Versus Cypher Select Treating Cornary Artery Lesions .
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter ( 10 site ) , open , prospective , 2-arm , unbalanced , randomize study design ass safety effectiveness CYPHER SELECT™ Sirolimus-eluting Coronary Stent compare CYPHER™ Sirolimus-eluting Coronary Stent . A total 100 patient enter study randomize 2:1 basis CYPHER SELECT™ stent CYPHER™ stent . 100 patient de novo native coronary artery lesion < 23 mm length 2.5 less 3.5 mm diameter visual estimate meet eligibility criterion either randomize .

Diagnosis angina pectoris define Canadian Cardiovascular Society Classification ( CCS I , II , III , IV ) OR unstable angina pectoris ( Braunwald Classification B & C , IIIIII ) OR patient document silent ischemia ; 2 . Single treatment de novo lesion coronary artery appropriately cover study stent 23mm length patient single multivessel disease ; patient multiple lesion include lesion successfully treat target lesion ; 3 . Target lesion 2.5 less 3.5mm diameter ( visual estimate ) ; 4 . Target lesion locate native coronary artery maximum lesion length adequately cover single 23 mm stent ; 5 . Target lesion stenosis > 50 % < 100 % ( visual estimate ) . 1 . A Qwave nonQwave myocardial infarction within precede 72 hour unless CK CKMB enzymes back normal ; 2 .
